job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: ltstronggtltugtcompany overviewltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtwarnermedia is a powerful portfolio of iconic entertainment news and sports brands we bring people technology and the worlds best storytellers together to drive culture and meaningful connection we believe the enduring power of stories can open our eyes to the world to each other and to new and different perspectivesltbrgtltbrgtjoin us shape your story hereltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtthe perksltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtexclusive warnermedia events and advance screeningsltligtltligtpaid time off every year to volunteer for eligible employeesltligtltligtaccess to wellbeing tools resources and freebiesltligtltligtaccess to inhouse learning and development resourcesltligtltligtpart of the warnermedia family of powerhouse brandsltbrgtltligtltulgtwarner media llc and its subsidiaries are equal opportunity employers qualified candidates will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion national origin gender sexual orientation gender identity or expression age mental or physical disability and genetic information marital status citizenship status military status protected veteran status or any other category protected by law
